# Estimate of upcoming orbs based on the 2021-08 calendar

[](https://i.imgur.com/k59MHYd.png)

This list of orbs is based on the [most recent calendar](https://twitter.com/FE_Heroes_EN/status/1424566128630718471/photo/1).

Notes:

*   The orbs for an event are shown either on the first day of the event or, if the event has multiple rounds, on the first day of each round. That doesn't mean it's possible to get all orbs on those exact days. In particular, it's impossible to get all orbs for Lost Lore on 2021-08-28.
    
*   I'm assuming you'll get 4 orbs at the end of Arena and Allegiance Battles. I'm also assuming you'll get 2 orbs at the end of each round of Pawns of Loki for your tier. Adjust accordingly.
    
*   I'm guessing version 5.9.0 with Squad Assault 50 will be released on 2021-09-05, 2 days before a Special Heroes banner.
    
*   I'm assuming we'll get Skill Studies 126 and its orb on 2021-08-19.
    
*   Previous "$COLOR Hostiles Quests" gave 4 orbs, so I'm assuming we'll also get 4 orbs on 2021-08-23.
    
*   Previous "$WEAPON Arts Quests" gave 4 orbs, so I'm assuming we'll also get 4 orbs on 2021-08-29.
    
*   I don't think we've ever seen something like "Armor Assault Quests", so we don't know if it'll give us any orbs on 2021-09-08.
    
*   The calendar has events up to 2021-09-09. The list below ends on 2020-09-13 to finish the Arena week.
    

Mon Aug 09: 9 orbs

*   1 - Tempest Trials+ Log-In Bonus (7/10)
    
*   2 - Special Heroes Log-In Bonus (5/10)
    
*   4 - Arena Tier
    
*   2 - Feh's Summer Special Maps (8/10)

Cumulative orbs from 2021-08-09

Example usage: if today is August 12, you've already collected today's orbs, and you want to know how many orbs you'll get until August 16, then look up the orbs for August 16 (57) and subtract the orbs for August 12 (31): 57 - 31 = 26.
